Fairfield.Mankas Corner, California:
Mankas Corner is an unincorporated community in the Suisun Valley, an American Viticulture Area (AVA) in Solano County, California.


== Description ==
The area around Mankas Corner is primarily agricultural, with the main crops being wine grapes and olives. However, row crops such as wheat, sorghum, sunflowers and soy beans are important also.
